metadata.description: Location where all resources will be deployed. This value defaults to the **East US** region.

Unique name for the deployed services below. Max length 15 characters, alphanumeric only:
- Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL
- Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
- Azure OpenAI
- Azure App Service
- Azure Functions

The name defaults to a unique string generated from the resource group identifier.
Specifies the version of Kubernetes to use for the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster. Defaults to **1.26.3**

configKeys.value: default, anomaly, hai, movies, sdzwa, weather, weather-sec
